questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) The people in the photo
B) The building with the flags
C) The sky
D) The street

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A busy street scene
B) A peaceful park
C) An architectural view
D) A family gathering

What is prominently displayed on the building?
A) Graffiti
B) Murals
C) American flags
D) Banners

What is the color of the building in the center of the photo?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Yellow
D) Green

How many American flags are visible in the photo?
A) 3
B) 5
C) 7
D) 6

What architectural style do the windows of the building suggest?
A) Modern
B) Gothic
C) Victorian
D) Art Deco

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) Another building
C) A river
D) A park

What colors are the window frames of the building?
A) White
B) Black
C) Green
D) Brown

What kind of roof does the building have?
A) Flat roof
B) Gabled roof
C) Dome roof
D) Pitched roof

What is the material of the building?
A) Wood
B) Brick
C) Glass
D) Metal

B) Arches
C) Lintels
D) Cornices

C) Blue
D) Yellow

What is the photo mainly about?
A) Nature
B) Architecture

D) Art

C) Company flags

B) Bay windows
C) Arched windows
D) Casement windows

B) Blue
C) White
D) All of the above

A) On the ground
B) On the roof
C) On the side of the building
D) On flagpoles in front of the building

A) Colonial
B) Classical
C) Modern
D) Baroque

What kind of lighting is visible in the photo?

B) Fairy lights
C) Neon lights
D) Lanterns

C) Metal
D) Wooden

B) Square
C) Rectangular
D) Arched

D) Plants

A) Stone
B) Brick
C) Wood
D) Glass

B) Boarded up
C) Intact
D) Missing

B) Decorative cornice
C) Solar panels
D) Chimney

What is the dominant architectural feature of the red building?
A) Large doors
B) Arched windows
C) Balconies
D) Columns

A) Above the windows
B) Below the windows
C) In front of the windows

A) Red and white
B) Red and black
C) Red and green

D) Fountains

A) Modern
B) Vintage

A) They are the same building
